    Writing More Content For My Jekyll Website, Improving the About Me Page

    Today I decided that I'm going to be working on improving the about me page on my site.

    Changing to Resume Style Rather Than A Portfolio Look

    I'm going to be trying to make it look more like a resume than a portfolio, kind of of the same thing but not really.

    How It's Changing

    I'm going to really focus on being descriptive about my skill level and what it is exactly I know how to do.
